data.message: Hi, My Brother Facebook account is disabled. How can i restore my brother fb account?

replies.message: Thanks for your message, Charli. We disable Facebook accounts that don't follow the Facebook Terms, which can be found here: http://bit.ly/2ibpZat. Additional reasons why your account may have been disabled are listed in this Help Center article: http://bit.ly/2yJ38Kt. If you think your account was disabled by mistake, you can submit an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2gDYTVT. -Anna

Facebook Dear Anna, My Brother submit an appealed since 5 days age. Uploaded NID card and added some account owner details in appeal form.  Finally, My brother don't get mail from Facebook. Please solve problem.
